meta.title: Jokesbapak2
meta.tagline: Largest collection of Indonesian dad jokes
meta.tagline-total: Largest collection ({total}!) of Indonesian dad jokes
meta.explanation: Instead of returning a joke in JSON format like others normally would, we return it on images!

error.heading: Whoops, you got an error!
error.homepage: Click here to go to homepage.

body.1: Sometime around early 2020, I was interested on seeing Indonesian dad jokes all over Twitter.
body.2: By the end of the month, I was obsessed with it.
body.3: Then, it was that time where I learn and created my Discord bot,
body.4: which I added a feature which you can ask for Indonesian dad jokes on a form of an image.
body.5: I thought, why not make it into an API where people can use it too?

submit.title: Can I submit my dad joke?

body.4: , and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
body.5: Bear in mind, your joke (or at least the content of the image) must not insult anyone and be racists.

contribute.title: I don't have any dad joke, can I contribute?

body.4: Feel free to crunch a bug, add a feature, or fix a small typo.

body.3: and I'll be in touch as soon as possible.

api.limit: We limit the request to be 15 request/minute.

random.title: Get single random joke
random.body: You'll get different result for every call.

today.title: Get today's joke
today.body: A joke a day makes more of a dad out of you.

id.title: Get joke by ID
id.body: You'll get consistent joke for every call with the same ID.

api.more: More documentation will soon arrive here...

introduction.1: To access the API, there are a few ways to do it.
introduction.2: It depends on what you are trying to accomplish with it.

fetch.2: You can use it, but I personally don't recommend it.
